timeline.message: Move model list APIs to use varargs

timeline.bodyText: These shouldn't have to change. Input-output models should have setter overloads for both varargs and List.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.message: Add missing vararg and List overloads
Added more vararg and List overloads, add JsonGetters to List overloads

timeline.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: We can leave the varargs setter here and remove the list one.
replies.author: sima-zhu

timeline.message: Remove list overload from input only model

timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Added checks to all usage of varargs, additionally updated options models as well as they would run into the same issue.
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.message: Add null checking validation for vararg overloads
